attributes.action: Tighter monitoring/laws on uninsured and unqualified mua's and beauty therapist
attributes.additional_details:
The beauty industry is a very detailed and informed industry. There is more to the industry than how to draw on an Eyebrow or apply highlighter. 
Having a comprehensive knowledge of anatomy and physiology.
There are many contraindications and contractions to be considered, client history cards and medical details need to be recorded and being able to offer aftercare advice
Unqualified people will not have understanding or knowledge of these process and incidents may occur due to this.
attributes.background: People that have watched youtube tutorials or one hour make up classes that are working as "qualified" make up artists and beauty therapist. These people constantly undercut truly qualified people in the beauty industry, they don't have the full understanding of contraindications and contractions
